docs.name: Vocat API
docs.info: Vocat is a teaching and learning platform that facilitates qualitative and quantitative assessment of a range of media. Built as a collaboration between the Center for Teaching and Learning at Baruch College, City University of New York and Cast Iron Coding of Portland, Oregon, the tool is in active development.
docs.copyright: Copyright 2015 Baruch College, City University of New York

resources.name: Assets
resources.full_description: Assets are any type of media that can be attached to submissions. Vocat currently understands multiple asset types including audio, image, video, vimeo, and youtube assets. Media that Vocat cannot understand is given an asset type of unknown.

methods.name: show

apis.short_description: shows a single asset and its associated attachment, and annotations

errors.description: The user is not authorized to view this asset.

params.name: id
params.description: The ID of the asset to show

examples:
Sample Response: { "id": 4542, "family": "video", "type": "Asset::Video", "name": "Dogs!", "created_at": "May 05 2015", "attachment_state": "processed", "thumbnail": "https://s3.amazonaws.com/vocat.dev/...", "locations": { "mp4": "https://s3.amazonaws.com/vocat.dev/processed/attachment/%3D&response-content-type=video%2Fmp4", "mp4_thumb": "https://s3.amazonaws.com/vocat.dev/processed/%3D&response-content-type=image%2Fpng", "webm": "https://s3.amazonaws.com/vocat.dev/processed/attachment/%3D&response-content-type=video%2Fwebm", "webm_thumb": "https://s3.amazonaws.com/vocat.dev/processed/%3D&response-content-type=image%2Fpng", "mov": "https://s3.amazonaws.com/vocat.dev/processed/%3D&response-content-type=video%mov", }, "file_info": "3.3 MB MOV Video", "listing_order": 0, "submission_id": 7395, "creator_type": "User", "project_id": 466, "creator_id": 4483, "annotations_count": 1, "attachment": { "id": 4869, "current_user_can_destroy": false, "state": "processed", "s3_upload_document": { "policy": "eyJleHBpcmF0aW9uIjoiMjAxNS0wNS0wNVQyMjo1NTo0MlTM2ODcwOTEyMF1dfQ==", "signature": "/LxvJJVHapg4Lv61aGGog=", "key": "source/attachment/4000_5000/4800_4900/4869.mov" }, "size": "3.3 MB", "extension": "mov", "bucket": "vocat.dev", "bucket_public_key": "AKIAJYR4RB6VUYLA" }, "annotations": [ { "id": 11678, "asset_id": 4542, "author_id": 4470, "body": "

methods.name: create

errors.description: The user is not authorized to attach an asset to this submission.
A required asset parameter is missing.

params.name: submission_id
params.description: The ID of the submission with which this asset is associated

params.name: listing_order_position
params.description: The position of this asset among other assets associated with the same submission

params.name: external_source
params.description: If the asset references an external asset, the external_source should specify what service hosts the asset
params.validator: Must be one of: youtube, vimeo.

params.name: external_location
params.description: The identifier of the asset at an exteranl source. For example, if the asset is a YouTube video, this would be the YouTube ID

params.name: id
params.description: The ID of an attachment object that should be attached to this asset

examples:
Sample Request:

{
    "name": "A sample asset",
    "listing_order": 0,
    "submission_id": 7395,
    "external_source": "youtube",
    "external_location": "PiqepG5GDZI"
}
Sample Response:

{
    "id": 4544,
    "family": "video",
    "type": "Asset::Youtube",
    "name": "A sample asset",
    "created_at": "May 05 2015",
    "attachment_state": "processed",
    "thumbnail": "http://img.youtube.com/vi/PiqepG5GDZI/mqdefault.jpg",
    "locations": {
        "url": "http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PiqepG5GDZI"
    },
    "file_info": "Youtube Video",
    "listing_order": 4194304,
    "submission_id": 7395,
    "creator_type": "User",
    "project_id": 466,
    "creator_id": 4483,
    "annotations_count": 0,
    "attachment": null,
    "annotations": []
}

errors.description: The user is not authorized to update this asset.
A required asset parameter is missing.

params.name: submission_id
params.description: The ID of the submission with which this asset is associated

params.name: listing_order_position
params.description: The position of this asset among other assets associated with the same submission

params.name: external_source
params.description: If the asset references an external asset, the external_source should specify what service hosts the asset
params.validator: Must be one of: youtube, vimeo.

params.name: external_location
params.description: The identifier of the asset at an exteranl source. For example, if the asset is a YouTube video, this would be the YouTube ID

params.name: id
params.description: The ID of an attachment object that should be attached to this asset

errors.description: The user is not authorized to delete the asset.

params.name: id
params.description: The ID of the asset to be deleted
